metadata.title: CVE-2016-6711 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in libvpx in Mediaserver inAndroid 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.xbefore 2016-11-01 could enable an attacker to use a specially crafted fileto cause a device hang or reboot. This issue is rated as High due to thepossibility of remote denial of service. Android ID: A-30593765.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
